Credential.description: A JSON-LD Verifiable Credential without a proof.

@context.description: The JSON-LD context of the credential.

id.description: The ID of the credential.

type.description: The JSON-LD type of the credential.

issuanceDate.description: The issuance date of the credential.

expirationDate.description: The expiration date of the credential.

verificationMethod.description: The URI of the verificationMethod used for the proof. Default assertionMethod URI.

proofPurpose.description: The purpose of the proof. Default 'assertionMethod'.

created.description: The date and time of the proof (with a maximum accuracy in seconds). Default current system time.

challenge.description: A challenge provided by the requesting party of the proof. For example 6e62f66e-67de-11eb-b490-ef3eeefa55f2

domain.description: The intended domain of validity for the proof. For example website.example

VerifyOptions.description: Options for specifying how the LinkedDataProof is created.
